# Stream Data Generator

A WordPress plugin to create dummy records on demand for Stream.

**Contributors:** [x-team](http://profiles.wordpress.org/x-team), [fjarrett](http://profiles.wordpress.org/fjarrett), [lukecarbis](http://profiles.wordpress.org/lukecarbis)  
**Tags:** [actions](http://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/actions), [activity](http://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/activity), [log](http://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/log), [notification](http://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/notification), [stream](http://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/stream), [data](http://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/data), [generator](http://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/generator)  
**Requires at least:** 3.7  
**Tested up to:** 3.8.1  
**Stable tag:** trunk (master)  
**License:** [GPLv2 or later](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html)  

## Description ##

Stream Data Generator generates dummy records to populate your Stream activity log for testing.
